channel.title: Chatgpt on Luke Salamone's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Chatgpt on Luke Salamone's Blog

item.title: Can ChatGPT Recognize Handwritten Digits?
item.description: TLDR: No. No it cannot. This was admittedly a fairly stupid experiment on the face of it. ChatGPT is a decoder-only model. It shouldn’t be able to perform an image recognition task. But then again, a decoder-only model wouldn’t have been my first choice for translation or summarization either. In my experience, ChatGPT has created translations which are at least as coherent and idiomatic as Google Translate, if not more so.
